fields.description:
While running Kitchen Sink Local Movie, app crashed with crash log indicating deadlock. Log Attached.

Intermittent.

Steps that Caused:

1. Run KitchenSink on iPhone4 4.3.5.
2. Go to: Phone > Play Movie > Local
3. Play the movie, navigate to the previous window, play the movie again, change tabs, repeat with different movie test cases (remote url, local, embedded).

Expected Result:

No crash.

Actual Result:

Intermittent crash with log.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink - Phone > Play Movie > Local - intermittent seg fault crash on navigation to previous window
fields.environment:
SDK: 1.8.0.1.v20111220190134
Studio: 1.0.7.201112152014
OS: OS X Lion
Devices Tested: iPhone4 4.3.5

comments.body: Able to reproduce, attached second crash log and console log file. Found in iPhone4 4.3.5 (same as above).

Cannot Reproduce on master or 1_8_X

Tested on Device iphone4 running 4.3.5 on OSX 10.7.2 with SDK 1.8.1.05d4b76 & 1.9.0.74a58eb
did not see in 1.8.1 ga pass, will reopen if we see it again
